name: Queen of Seas 2
description: Queen of Seas 2 is a platform game based on elements of afro-brazilian culture. Player needs to bring hope back to the village, rescuing the villager’s lost memories in the ocean floor to make faith in Yemanjá return to the hearts of the residents.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Pentium or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon or equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
